abstract: SABMiller’s effort to acquire of the Australian beer giant Foster’s values the company at about $10 billion. DealBook’s Jeffrey Cane and Adrienne Carter discuss the rationale behind the proposed deal and the continuing consolidation in the beer market.
snippet: SABMiller’s effort to acquire of the Australian beer giant Foster’s values the company at about $10 billion. DealBook’s Jeffrey Cane and Adrienne Carter discuss the rationale behind the proposed deal and the continuing consolidation in the beer ma...
lead_paragraph: SABMiller’s effort to acquire of the Australian beer giant Foster’s values the company at about $10 billion. DealBook’s Jeffrey Cane and Adrienne Carter discuss the rationale behind the proposed deal and the continuing consolidation in the global beer market.

byline.original: By Jeffrey Cane, Adrienne Carter and Mac William Bishop
